Text:
This is my first torrent in 5 years. This small file was a test to make sure I've got things right before I start seeding some original stuff. I'm getting back in the game dudes :)

I'm now looking at my uTorrent window, and it says 1 seeder (me) and 5 peers trying to download. But for some reason I'm not sending this file out. I've checked all the options I think I should have checked, but still not seeding / sending the data out to the peers. Any tips? Assistance?
